## CardProps interface


<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export interface Props extends ContainerProps 
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { CardProps } from '@grafana/ui';
```
<b>Properties</b>

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [description](#description-property) | <code>string</code> | Card description text |
|  [disabled](#disabled-property) | <code>boolean</code> | Indicates if the card and all its actions can be interacted with |
|  [heading](#heading-property) | <code>ReactNode</code> | Main heading for the Card \* |
|  [href](#href-property) | <code>string</code> | Link to redirect to on card click. If provided, the Card inner content will be rendered inside <code>a</code> |
|  [onClick](#onclick-property) | <code>() =&gt; void</code> | On click handler for the Card |

### description property

Card description text

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
description?: string;
```

### disabled property

Indicates if the card and all its actions can be interacted with

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
disabled?: boolean;
```

### heading property

Main heading for the Card \*

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
heading: ReactNode;
```

### href property

Link to redirect to on card click. If provided, the Card inner content will be rendered inside `a`

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
href?: string;
```

### onClick property

On click handler for the Card

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
onClick?: () => void;
```
